test.name: Does the TA's metadata policy for an RP contain a correct userinfo_encrypted_response_alg parameter value
test.description: In order to check the compliance of a metadata policy issued by the TA, an entity statement for an RP must be fetched in the entity's fetch endpoint. Once obtained the entity statement, the metadata_policy parameter is taken and the presence of the userinfo_encrypted_response_alg parameter inside the openid_relying_party type is checked. It must contain one_of=["RSA-OAEP", "RSA-OAEP-256", "ECDH-ES", "ECDH-ES+A128KW", "ECDH-ES+A256KW"] AND {"essential":true}
